title: Tape Record
source:
[[if {$delay}]]
[[*declare componentTapeDelay {@componentTapeDelay} + {$delay}]]
[[else]]
[[*declare componentTapeDelay {@componentTapeDelay} + 3]]
[[/if]]

[[if {$duration}]]
[[*declare componentTapeDuration {@componentTapeDuration} + {$duration}]]
[[else]]
[[*declare componentTapeDuration 2.5]]
[[/if]]

[[span class="record" style="--delay: {@componentTapeDelay}; --duration: {@componentTapeDuration}"]]
{@componentTapeDelay}
{@componentTapeDuration}
{$text}
[[/span]]

[[ifexpr "%%this|fullname%%"=="component:tape-record"]]
[[iftags визуальный_элемент]]
[[module Redirect destination="/component:tape"]]
[[/iftags]]
[[/ifexpr]]
